title: The Fallen One
description: The Fallen One (Sons of the Dark Mother Saga, Part #1)The Fallen One is an in-depth saga about an ancient race and a prophecy that foretells of four dark princes, the sons of the dark mother, who will rise up with a nation of old vamps to stop the rogue factions from ruling over mankind. The book is part of an ongoing and lengthy saga and will be republished in August.
author: Lenore Wolfe
